1.title: Basic Information
1.description: Please fill in the fields below by providing the official name of your company as well as its complete address, including street number, street name, city, postal code, and country.

2.title: Job Information
2.description: Enter the required information to help students find you more easily.

3.title: Description
3.description: Enter a detailed job description, including a description of the employee's role, desired qualities, and required experience.

4.title: Particularities
4.description: By choosing from the options below, describe the different modes of your job.

5.title: Dates
5.description: Enter the start and end dates of the internship, as well as the application deadline.

6.success_text: Your internship offer has been submitted. Please allow some time for the administrator to approve your offer.

qualiteTravail.title: Step 2: WORK QUALITY
qualiteTravail.description: Ability to complete assigned tasks by setting personal quality standards

fields.field1: Respect the tasks assigned to them
fields.field2: Pay attention to detail when completing tasks
fields.field3: Check work to ensure nothing is forgotten
fields.field5: Perform a good analysis of encountered problems

relationsInterpersonnelles.title: Step 3: RELATIONSHIP QUALITIES
relationsInterpersonnelles.description: Ability to establish harmonious relationships in the workplace

fields.field3: Easily adapt to the company culture
fields.field6: Demonstrate active listening by trying to understand others' viewpoints

habiletesPersonnelles.title: Step 4: PERSONAL SKILLS
habiletesPersonnelles.description: Ability to demonstrate mature and responsible attitudes or behaviors

fields.field1: Demonstrate interest and motivation at work
fields.field5: Demonstrate good responsibility requiring minimal supervision
fields.field6: Be punctual and consistent at work

evaluationFinale.title: Step 6: Final Evaluation
evaluationFinale.discussion_label: This evaluation was discussed with the intern:
evaluationFinale.stage_label: The company would like to host the student again:

step2.title: Step 2: Work Quality
step2.description: Ability to complete tasks under responsibility by setting personal quality standards

step3.title: Step 3: Relationship Quality
step3.description: Ability to establish harmonious interrelations in the work environment

step4.title: Step 4: Personal Skills
step4.description: Ability to demonstrate mature and responsible attitudes or behaviors

evaluation_milieu_stage.no_evaluation: No Internship Environment evaluation to display at the moment

fields.field1: The tasks assigned to the intern are consistent with those announced in the internship agreement
fields.field2: Welcome measures facilitate the integration of the new intern
fields.field3: The actual time spent supervising the intern is sufficient
fields.field4: The work environment complies with health and safety standards

fields.field1: The internship environment is accessible by public transport
fields.field2: The salary offered is attractive for the intern
fields.field3: Communication with the internship supervisor facilitates the internship
fields.field4: The equipment provided is adequate for the tasks assigned

section4.title: Section 4: General Observations
section4.field3: Number of students that can be accommodated
section4.field4: Same intern for the next internship
